div.p: Moenatides to Merula, strategus of the Hermopolite nome, greeting. I have sent you a duplicate of the petition presented to me by Hermodorus son of Cornelius, with my signature, together with the documents brought to me by the secretaries, in order that, if the debts are paid, the ensuing remission of the lands be effected, but only if nothing is still due to the Treasury. I write this as the deputy of the most high Proculus in his visit to Egypt. I pray for your health. Date. Translation: P.Ryl. 2 83 V
